segments.text: Mr . Carmichael , this is Ellen Bower calling again . You had said I should call this week to schedule an interview with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right , Ms . Bower . How are you ? I'm not sure if I ’ ll be able to fit you in this week , I ’ m afraid .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I understand , Mr . Carmichael . I'd be glad to make it some time next week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , then . Why don't we say next Tuesday at 11:30 a . m . ?
segments.speaker: S2
